/usr/bin/mpicxx  -fno-omit-frame-pointer -Wfatal-errors -Wall -Wextra -g CMakeFiles/phdf5_example.dir/main.cpp.o -o phdf5_example  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/hdf5/openmpi:/opt/adios2/lib /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/hdf5/openmpi/libhdf5.so /opt/adios2/lib/libadios2_c_mpi.so.2.10.1 /opt/adios2/lib/libadios2_c.so.2.10.1 /opt/adios2/lib/libadios2_cxx11_mpi.so.2.10.1 /opt/adios2/lib/libadios2_cxx11.so.2.10.1 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib/libmpi.so -Wl,-rpath-link,/opt/adios2/lib
